title: Samy Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Samy Bengio (born 1965) is a Canadian computer scientist working as senior director of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Research at Apple. Bengio obtained his Ph.D. in Computer Science in 1993 with a thesis titled Optimization of a Parametric Learning Rule for Neural Networks from ...

title: Google Brain co-founder Samy Bengio joins Apple | AI Business
snippet: Samy Bengio, Canadian computer scientist and Google Brain co-founder, has joined Apple as the company’s research director.

title: Yoshua Bengio - Wikipedia
snippet: Yoshua Bengio OC OQ FRS FRSC (born March 5, 1964) is a Canadian computer scientist, and a pioneer of artificial neural networks and deep learning. He is a professor at the Université de Montréal and co-president and scientific director of ...
